# DynamicConfigReturn

## <ApiType type="Class" path="prompt_templates/decorator/DynamicConfigReturn" symbolName="DynamicConfigReturn" /> DynamicConfigReturn

Protocol for a prompt template function that returns a dynamic configuration.
